Description: Michigan Sugar, a grower-owned sugar cooperative located in Bay City, Mich., agreed to install pollution reduction measures valued at more than $13 million at its processing facility to resolve alleged violations of the Clean Air Act. Michigan Sugar also agreed to pay a $210,000 civil penalty.
Agency: Justice Department Environment and Natural Resources Division
